full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Flooring Replacement - Keele CCC

#### Announcement Information

* Reference Number: cb-7-12043702
* Solicitation Number: 21480-25-4912708
* Publication Date: 2024-11-20
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-12-19 10:00:00 (GMT)

#### Project Overview

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) at the Keele Community Correctional Centre (CCC) is seeking a qualified contractor to replace the linoleum flooring and carpet tiles in the living unit and meeting spaces. The project aims to provide a safe and comfortable environment for the inmates and staff.

#### Tender Details

* Category: Construction Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Toronto
* Regions of Delivery: Toronto
* Estimated Quantity: Refer to the solicitation document for details

#### Deliverables

The successful contractor will be responsible for:

* Removing the existing linoleum floors, surrounding trim, and transitions, and disposing of them in accordance with environmental regulations.
* Making necessary repairs and preparations to the sub-floor on both the first and second floors for new flooring installation.
* Installing new linoleum flooring on the second floor, meeting the following specifications:
	+ Rolled, 2.5mm thickness, eco-friendly, and 100% biodegradable.
	+ Colour to be confirmed by the project authority after contract award.
* Installing carpet tiles on the first floor, meeting the following specifications:
	+ 24” x 24” glue-down, polypropylene, solution-dyed carpet tile.
	+ Minimum two (2) millimeters thickness, maximum three (3) millimeters thick.
	+ Lifetime commercial warranty.
	+ Colour to be confirmed by the project authority after contract award.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price

#### Contract Details

* Contracting Authority: Robin Riha
* Contact Information: Email: [robin.riha@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:robin.riha@csc-scc.gc.ca), Phone: (613) 328-9727
* Contract Duration: The contractor must complete the work by March 31st, 2025.

#### Optional Documents

* Complete solicitation document and associated documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buys/Tender Opportunities website.
* Comprehensive land claim agreement, security requirements, and Indigenous business set
